statements: UPDATE faq_articles SET content='Updated content' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE faq_articles SET category='Support', title='New Title' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE faq_articles SET content = 'New content', title = 'Updated Title' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE faq_articles SET category = 'Updated Category', content = 'Modified Content', created_at = NOW() WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE FAQs SET answer = 'New Answer' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE KnowledgeBaseArticles SET content = 'Updated Content', article_title = 'New Title' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE FAQs SET question='How can I reset my password?', answer='To reset your password, please follow the instructions on our website.' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE KnowledgeBaseArticles SET content='Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Quisque semper varius ex, sit amet porttitor velit varius vel. Nam et sem mauris. Nullam porta nisi non orci vehicula, id finibus velit commodo.' WHERE id=5;
UPDATE faqs SET answer = 'New answer' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE articles SET category = 'Tech' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE faqs SET question='How can I reset my password?', answer='You can reset your password by visiting the password reset page.' WHERE id=1

UPDATE articles SET category='Technology', title='Latest Tech Updates', content='Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur eget felis venenatis, imperdiet mi nec, consectetur risus.' WHERE id=3
UPDATE faqs SET question = 'What is your new question?' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE tags SET tag_name = 'Updated Tag Name' WHERE tag_id = 2;
UPDATE faqs SET question = 'New Question', answer = 'New Answer' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE articles SET content = 'Updated Content', title = 'Updated Title' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE faqs SET question='How to update a row in SQL?' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE users SET email='new_email@example.com' WHERE name='John Doe';
UPDATE faqs SET question = 'How can I update my profile?' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE articles SET content = 'New content for article' WHERE id = 2;
